node.title: 'Bureaucratic overlords': SA senator Alex Antic speaks out after being taken to medi-hotel to quarantine
node.alt: A man with dark brown hair wearing a suit in front of the Senate chamber
node.description: Liberal senator Alex Antic is taken to a medi-hotel after arriving from Canberra a week after Prime Minister Scott Morrison said he was fully vaccinated.
node.content: ["Liberal senator Alex Antic has been taken to a medi-hotel after arriving from Canberra.", "Speaking on ABC Radio Adelaide this morning,\u00a0Mr Antic said he had been in Canberra for two weeks for work and attempted to come back but was \"met with some resistance\" and ultimately told he needed to go into a medi-hotel.", "\"Now I'm surrounded by COVID in a medi-hotel and that's alarming,\" he said.", "When asked why he was in a medi-hotel, Mr Antic said it was \"a very good question\".", "\"That's a question you might like to direct to the bureaucratic overlords at SA Health,\" he said.", "Mr Antic said on prior trips back from Canberra he had been\u00a0allowed to\u00a0quarantine at home for two weeks.", "Under border changes which took effect on November 23, all unvaccinated travellers into South Australia must quarantine for 14 days on arrival.", "Mr Antic, who said he would withhold his vote in federal parliament until state vaccination mandates are overturned, said\u00a0he had been \"very, very vocal\" about vaccination mandates.", "\"Now all of a sudden I seem to have been singled out in what appears to be a political stunt and the only inference you can really draw from this is this has\u00a0been quite pre-meditated,\" he said.", "He said he had a COVID test on Wednesday that was negative.", "Prime Minister Scott Morrison told ABC Radio Adelaide last week that Mr Antic was double vaccinated.", "Mr Antic refused to confirm whether he was fully vaccinated, but said he had \"never said anything I believe that would mislead the Prime Minister on any issue\".", "More to come."]
